snippet: Like many other wine enthusiasts, Paul Wasserman trusted Rudy Kurniawan, until he saw photographs taken at Mr. Kurniawan’s home that showed a laboratory used to manufacture counterfeit wines.
abstract: Rudy Kurniawan, Los Angeles wine dealer who was arrested on charges of counterfeiting expensive wines, had earned the trust of his partner Paul Wasserman and other wine enthusiasts; associates say they are left feeling duped by their ties to him.
lead_paragraph: Like many other wine enthusiasts, Paul Wasserman trusted Rudy Kurniawan, until he saw photographs taken at Mr. Kurniawan’s home that showed a laboratory used to manufacture counterfeit wines.

headline.seo: Rudy Kurniawan, Wine Dealer Accused of Fraud, Was Trusted by His Associates
headline.main: Wine Dealer Was Trusted by His Allies
headline.print_headline: To Trusting Allies, a Wine Dealer Accused of Counterfeiting Was a Taster of Rare Acumen
